verses.verse: Hear <WH8085> ye this word <WH1697> which I take up <WH5375> for a lamentation <WH7015> over you <WH1004>, O house of Israel <WH3478>.

Forasmuch <WH3282> therefore as ye trample <WH1318> upon the poor <WH1800>, and take <WH3947> exactions <WH4864> from him of wheat <WH1250>: ye have built <WH1129> houses <WH1004> of hewn stone <WH1496>, but ye shall not dwell <WH3427> in them <WH5193>; ye have planted pleasant <WH2531> vineyards <WH3754>, but ye shall not drink <WH8354> the wine thereof <WH3196>.

For I know <WH3045> how manifold <WH7227> are your transgressions <WH6588>, and how mighty <WH6099> are your sins <WH2403>â€” ye that afflict <WH6887> the just <WH6662>, that take <WH3947> a bribe <WH3724>, and that turn aside <WH5186> the needy <WH34> in the gate from their right <WH8179>.

And in all vineyards <WH3754> shall be wailing <WH4553>; for I will pass <WH5674> through <WH7130> the midst of thee <WH559>, saith Jehovah <WH3068>.
Woe <WH1945> unto you that desire <WH183> the day <WH3117> of Jehovah <WH3068>! Wherefore <WH4100> would ye have the day <WH3117> of Jehovah <WH3068>? It is darkness <WH2822>, and not light <WH216>.

I hate <WH8130>, I despise <WH3988> your feasts <WH2282>, and I will take no delight <WH7306> in your solemn assemblies <WH6116>.

Yea <WH5927>, though ye offer me your burnt-offerings <WH5930> and meal-offerings <WH4503>, I will not accept <WH7521> them <WH5027>; neither will I regard the peace-offerings <WH8002> of your fat beasts <WH4806>.
